title: Houndmaster

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to Interrogate. You learn how much stress they have.
- At night, send your Hound to a player. You learn who they visit.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may both Interrogate and send your Hound to a player on the same night.
- Your Hound is an astral visit.

desc:
Post 5321
*A lawman and his faithful beast: a bond forged by battle and bloodshed.*
